name: ECOPlugs
0:
”Alexa, turn on light”
”Alexa, turn off light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Control your ECO Plugs switch with you voice using Amazon Alexa, and this Alexa skill. The skill will work with ECO Plugs family products, such as smart switch, in-wall switch, indoor/outdoor use smart receptacle, smart power strip, smart yard stake, smart box etc. Just ask Alexa to turn on or off any lamps that you plug into ECO Plugs products, such as Christmas tree lights, bedroom lamps etc. To learn more about compatible ECO Plugs products, please visit: www.eco-plugs.net

To get started, you need to use the ECO Plugs app to connect your ECO Plugs devices to your home network and give them a distinct name. Then tap the setting of ECO Plugs app, select “Connect to Amazon Alexa”, input your Alexa account, the device will join into the Alexa automatically, you open the Alexa app, select the Smart Home to check the ECO Plugs device.

After Alexa discovers your device, just say “Alexa, turn ON or turn OFF <device name>” to control your devices.
